content.title: Accessibility Resource Center | Verizon Accessibility
content.content:
At Verizon, we’re striving to make our products and services accessible, moving our world forward through compliance and beyond. This means improving the customer experience for everyone.
Accessibility Statement.
Increasing access.
We want to make sure that every customer has the chance to get the very most from their Verizon digital experience. Accessing the products and services we offer online should be an easy, rewarding, and satisfying experience. That is why we are committed to making our digital space accessible for customers of all abilities.
Optimizing your experience.
To optimize the digital experience for all of our customers, we strive to meet the online accessibility standards recommended by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) in its Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 AA. We take a number of steps to attempt to meet or exceed those standards:
We utilize various assistive technology across desktop, tablets, mobile devices, and in-store to test against the WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility guidelines.
We work with our Advocates for Disability, Accessibility, Neurodiversity, and Caregiver Empowerment (ADVANCE) resource group, as well as industry partners, to remain informed about accessibility issues and to improve user experiences.
We have a blended team of accessibility professionals who are continuously working to make each customer’s digital experience the best it can be.
Improving constantly.
Our commitment to accessibility doesn’t stop. We continue to assess and reassess our content to create a more accessible user experience across our digital spaces.
Vision
Discover products like screen readers and dictation apps designed to help the blind or those with low vision.
Hearing
Features like real-time text (RTT), text telephone (TTY) and closed captioning can assist users with auditory impairments.
Cognitive
Use a variety of tools built into your device to help you stay organized and on track throughout the day.
Mobility
Interact with your devices via other assistive devices, your voice, facial expressions, gestures or a simple tap.
Aging
Discover new technologies that enable people to live healthier, more fulfilling lives at all ages.
Resources
Explore a wide range of additional resources and tools available to enhance the accessibility of products and services.
Live
Caption
Enable your device to detect speech and automatically generate captions during phone calls or even while listening to music with lyrics.
Universal Switch
For those who have difficulty touching device screens, designate certain touches or gestures to control specific actions on your phone.
Display Settings
Take advantage of high contrast, large display, large fonts, high contrast fonts, zoom, magnification and much more.
Accessibility Shortcuts
Make it quick and easy to turn on or switch between your accessibility apps.
Sound Amplification
Filter, augment and amplify the sounds in your environment or on your iOS or Android device.
Personal Assistant
Smartphone personal assistants can help you find files, turn your accessibility features on or off, and more.
Accessibility settings
Learn more about Verizon’s wide range of innovative solutions that increase the accessibility of our products and services.
Accessibility news
See the latest news and stories about how Verizon supports every person, regardless of age or ability via accessible technology.
The Valuable 500
Verizon is a partner with the Valuable 500 in advancing innovations for disability inclusion to move the world forward.
FAQ section
Verizon strives to provide the most up-to-date information to all our customers. Please find some of the most common FAQs.
- National Accessibility Customer Service
- Reach us at 888-262-1999
- Monday – Saturday
8:00 am to 7:00 pm EST - Sunday
8:00 am to 5:00 pm EST
- Verizon Center for Customers
with Disabilities - Fios - Reach us at 800-974-6006 (Voice) /
508-251-5301 (TTY) - Monday – Friday
8:30 am to 5:00 pm EST

content.title: Business Internet Services: Plans for Small Business & Enterprise | Verizon
content.content:
Fios Business Internet
Ultra-fast, fiber-optic internet with 99.99% network reliability and high bandwidth for speedy performance—plus, 24/7 business-class support
5G Business Internet
Secure wireless internet with fast download speeds, unlimited data, and easy implementation
LTE Business Internet
Wireless internet with out-of-the-box setup, plus a high-quality router to easily connect operations on the go.
Benefits
Internet built for your business
Connectivity you can rely on
Get more out of your business internet. Choose from our flexible, affordable, award-winning options to help meet the unique demands of your business.
Customer stories
Appalachian Pipeline
See how Appalachian Pipeline Contractors connects construction job sites quickly with LTE Business Internet.
Ronin Design Co.
See how Ronan Design Co. is making a productivity breakthrough with the help of 5G Business Internet.
The Dental Family
See how Fios helps doctors Brett and Irene Druger achieve their dream of becoming a fully digital office.
Resources
Implement a simpler connectivity solution for retail.
Learn how retailers deliver excellent customer service and stay competitive with the help of Verizon Internet Dedicated Services with Cisco® Meraki® and 4G LTE backup.
Discover an easier networking solution for banks.
Learn how banks increase sales and keep customer data secure with the help of Verizon Internet Dedicated Services with Cisco® Meraki® and 4G LTE backup.
Stay agile and connected with Internet Dedicated Services.
Get the reliability, flexibility and control your organization needs with this secure, dedicated connection.
Connect easily and reliably with LTE Business Internet.
LTE Business Internet can meet even the largest and most complex enterprise needs, whether you’re connecting a single employee or your whole workforce.
FAQs
The best internet options for your business depend on various factors, such as your location and the nature of your business. Verizon Business offers several types of business internet options to cater to different needs and requirements.
These options include:
Fios Business Internet: Upgrade your business internet to Verizon's ultra-fast fiber-optic network with 99.99% network reliability. This option provides blazing-fast speeds and high bandwidth for efficient operations. Fios is available in select areas.
5G Business Internet: Experience fast and scalable wireless connectivity solutions with Verizon's 5G Business Internet. This option offers fast speeds, low latency and unlimited data to support businesses of any size. 5G Business Internet availability varies and it is not available in all locations.
LTE Business Internet: For businesses with a need for mobility, Verizon's LTE Business Internet provides wireless connectivity with easy setup and pervasive coverage. It is suitable for primary or failover connectivity and can be used in various on-the-go scenarios.
Internet Dedicated Service: Fuel your business with high-performance internet through Verizon's Internet Dedicated Service. This option offers scalable speeds and bandwidth, customizable Quality of Service and enterprise-class service-level agreements.
When selecting the best internet for your business, consider factors such as reliability, speed, scalability and specific business requirements. Verizon’s range of business internet options can provide the necessary connectivity to keep your business running smoothly and meet your specific needs.
For Fios and LTE Business Internet plans, the price guarantee extends for up to 3 years, depending on your plan; with a 1 year price guarantee for the low speed plan, a 2 year guarantee for the mid speed plan and a 3 year guarantee for the high speed plan. Our business internet price guarantees ensure that you can rely on stable pricing for the duration of the applicable guarantee period, providing peace of mind and cost predictability for your business.
Verizon’s business internet services require a compatible router. For LTE and 5G Business Internet, the router policy allows customers the option to either purchase the Verizon provided gateway router or bring their own compatible device (BYOD). Routers purchased from Verizon can be returned within a 30-day return and exchange period subject to our Return Policy. A restocking fee may apply. Customers may also bring their own device (BYOD); check the open development showcase for compatible models.
For Fios Business Internet, customers can either purchase the Verizon provided router, choose to rent the router, or bring their own compatible device (BYOD). Routers purchased from Verizon can be returned within a 30-day return and exchange period subject to our Return Policy.
Verizon provides a 30-day satisfaction guarantee for its wireless business internet plans and for Fios with a 2-yr term. This guarantee allows customers to evaluate the service and cancel within 30 days of ordering if they are not satisfied. If you decide to cancel within this period, you can contact Verizon to initiate the cancellation process. Routers purchased from Verizon can be returned within 30 days subject to our Return Policy.
Yes, Verizon business internet solutions are available nationwide. Verizon offers extensive coverage and availability for its business internet services. Check your address to find out which Verizon business internet service is available in your specific area.
The ideal internet speed for your business depends on factors specific to your business. It's important to consider both download and upload speeds. To determine the best internet speed for your business, consider factors such as the number of employees, the nature of your business activities and the need for reliable connectivity. You can test your current internet speed here.
Yes, Verizon business internet solutions include Wi-Fi capabilities and offers equipment that supports the latest Wi-Fi technology. Additionally, Verizon's business internet plans can support Wi-Fi from third-party routers, giving businesses flexibility in choosing their preferred Wi-Fi setup. This ensures that businesses can enjoy wireless connectivity for their operations and provide internet access to their employees.
The main differences between business internet and home internet is that business internet plans can be purchased only by business customers (with an ECPD profile indicating that they are a corporate liable end user). Business internet hardware often have more ruggedized components designed for use in professional and high use settings. Business internet plans are also architected to be compatible with a wider selection of routers and network treatments like MPN, Dynamic IP, Static IP, etc. Home internet has a different portfolio of plans and limited router choices.

content.title: Public Sector Technology and Network Solutions | Verizon
content.content:
Who we help
Get secure, purpose-built public sector solutions—backed by decades of experience and public safety technology—to help you meet the needs of your community, no matter who you serve.
State & Local Government
Enhance services for your communities and discover funding opportunities.
Federal Government
Help federal agencies deliver critical services and find secure solutions for defense.
Public Safety
Learn about Verizon Frontline Crisis Response Team and Verizon Frontline, the advanced network for first responders on the frontlines.
Education
Give your K-12 students, instructors and higher education staff the tools they need to succeed.
Devices
Keep your organization connected, securely. Get exclusive offers on public sector devices on America’s most reliable 5G network. *
5G solutions
Put our reliable 5G and MEC technology to work for your organization, to get the fast speeds and low latency you need to transform.
5G for State & Local
By connecting infrastructure, devices and people, 5G can help communities transform and power economic development, constituent services and transportation systems.
5G for Federal
Expand your capabilities at military bases, agencies and more to help achieve your missions.
5G for Public Safety
Tap the power of 5G to get critical information to those on the front lines, power drones, facilitate AR training simulations and more with Verizon Frontline.
Internet
Deploy wireless internet built to meet even the most demanding institutional needs, to help keep onsite, remote and hybrid workforces connected.
Best Practices Product Leadership Award
Access the full report to learn why Frost & Sullivan recognized our wireless business internet for excellence.
Cybersecurity
Find the insights and solutions you need to help protect your agency and community against cyber threats.
2025 Data Breach Investigations Report
Today’s threat landscape is shifting. Get the latest updates on real-world breaches and help safeguard your organization from cybersecurity attacks.
2024 Payment Security Report
Learn how to get to the root of your payment security strategy to better address PCI DSS v4.0 compliance requirements.
Digital transformation
Create a digital ecosystem that is fast, reliable, secure and adaptive to help future-proof your organization and improve service.
Contact centers and CX
Deliver reliable, effective services with modern cloud contact centers and unified communications tools built to support your mission.
Featured programs
Attend industry-leading programs, events and more to help you make better informed decisions.

content.title: Tech Solutions for Your Business: Small Business, B2B & Enterprise | Verizon
content.content:
Products
Whatever your business size or type, our products can help you do more.
Mobile
Level up your on-the-go work with mobile phones, devices and plans for your business. On the network America relies on.
Internet
Get internet solutions that are fast, affordable, reliable, and available virtually anywhere you do business.
Security and protection
Discover security solutions that are simple to use but sophisticated enough to help keep modern cyber threats at bay.
Voice and collaboration
Connect employees and customers while in the office or remote, with reliable communication solutions.
Contact Center and CX
Let customer experience define your brand and help boost satisfaction, retention, renewals and wallet share.
Internet of Things
IoT can help you maintain safety, manage costs, boost efficiency and enhance the customer experience.
Fleet management
Help transform the way you manage your fleet while boosting worker productivity with GPS tracking, cameras, reports, alerts and more.
Industries
Tackle the unique challenges facing your business with a wide array of industry-specific solutions, tools and trustworthy partners.
Automotive
Build the framework needed to support connected vehicles of the future and other automotive innovations.
Construction
Invest in digital tools and innovative tech to boost your connected construction capabilities.
Education
Inspire learning through technology solutions that address the needs of students and teachers.
Energy and Utilities
Accelerate innovation with our transformative technologies and help power the future of modern grids.
Federal Government
Connect and transform your agency with secure technology that helps you meet the needs of your communities.
Healthcare
Drive real-time connectivity, help protect sensitive info, help improve patient experiences and more.
Manufacturing
Drive productivity with our 5G network to help keep your facilities connected, efficient, flexible and protected.
Media and Entertainment
Enable operational efficiencies, enhance fan experiences, help protect proprietary data and more.
Public Safety
Give first responders the speed, coverage and security they can count on in extreme and routine situations.
Retail
Support immersive technologies, enhance experiences and drive efficiencies with the power of 5G.
Key business needs
Modernize your IT infrastructure
Empower your business with the flexibility, productivity and agility you need to innovate and achieve goals.
Boost cybersecurity
Help protect your business, brand, employees, customers and more from cyber threats.

content.title: Why Verizon? Choosing a Business Internet & Mobile Network | Verizon
content.content:
Take advantage of our difference.
When you choose Verizon, you’ll partner with people who put your business first.
Network is just part of our story.
We’re proud of our world-class network. We’re also proud to say it’s only part of what we do.
Powering Indy: An Enterprise Partnership
From the grandstands to the track, we’re helping one of the world’s largest venues deliver a better race-day experience to drive its business forward.
Enterprise Intelligence
Don’t just connect your business. Make it even smarter. Partner with us to gain the confidence, control, security, speed and ability to adapt to changing needs in real time.
Verizon Test Force
We’re a team of engineers committed to ensuring the best network experience for your business. When it comes to your network, we don’t compromise on reliability.
1 Most reliable 5GN/RootMetrics: Most reliable 5G network based on more first place rankings in RootMetrics® 5G data reliability assessments of 125 metro markets conducted in 1H 2023. Tested with best commercially available smartphones on three national mobile networks across all available network types. Your experiences may vary. RootMetrics rankings are not an endorsement of Verizon.
2 For J.D. Power 2023 award information, visit jdpower.com/awards.
3 Verizon is #1 for Network Quality in all 6 regions (tied in the Mid-Atlantic, Southeast, and North Central regions). Verizon has also received the highest number of awards in Network Quality for the 32nd time as compared to all other brands in the J.D. Power 2003–2023 Volume 1 and 2 and 2024 Volume 1 U.S. Wireless Network Quality Performance Studies. content.title: Business Resources and Insights | Verizon
content.content:
Business Resources & Insights
Your go-to source for the latest ideas, innovations and studies that can impact the future of your business.
2025 Data Breach Investigations Report
Today’s threat landscape is shifting. Get the latest updates on real-world breaches and help safeguard your organization from cybersecurity attacks.
2024 Payment Security Report
Learn how to get to the root of your payment security strategy to better address PCI DSS v4.0 compliance requirements.
2024 Mobile Security Index
Verizon's 2024 MSI report is to help security professionals, such as CISOs, assess and calibrate their organization’s mobile security defenses.
The Benefits of School Bus Wi-Fi
School bus Wi-Fi is now E-Rate eligible and offers a unique solution for building digital inclusivity and closing the homework gap.
Your Small Business Growth Partner
What can a small business partner do for you? Learn how Verizon can help you improve operations, manage your workforce and keep data secure.
Trending topics
AI in Education: Current and future applications
Learn more about AI's current and emerging uses in education, along with some key challenges.
A Guide to Digital Inclusion in Education
Learn how digital inclusion in education is helping to ensure students of all backgrounds, technological proficiency or other limitations have equal access to technology. Explore now.
Three challenges facing higher education
Learn how Verizon can help your organization adapt to the new era of cyber security threats and strengthen higher education institution's IT security.
The Smart Factory Of The Future
Forward-thinking manufacturers are using advanced technologies and network architectures to achieve Enterprise Intelligence. Explore how the traditional factory floor is evolving.
Building a Network Technology Foundation for Retail Innovation
Learn about advanced network technology and digital solutions like fixed wireless access (FWA) and RFID tags to drive retail innovation, enhance customer experiences, and meet rising omnichannel demands.
Empower your agencies to better serve your constituents and workforce
Understand how you can stay connected wherever your work takes you—to better serve your constituents and workforce.
Building the Network Foundation for the Connected Hospital of the Future
The hospital of the future is a connected hospital that relies on multiple technologies to create an integrated hospital network infrastructure.
Get the right network technology and resources to smooth your equipment deployments
Network expansion, integrating voice and data infrastructures, and more can put a strain on resources. With the right customer premises equipment (CPE) provider, it doesn?t have to. That?s where Verizon Edge Solutions Deployment Services can help.
2024 DBIR Healthcare Snapshot
Read about the different kinds of healthcare data breaches in the Verizon 2024 DBIR. See how the latest healthcare data security measures up.
Boost your digital customer experience with CX advisory services
Verizon's CX advisors can help you elevate your digital customer experience with a wide variety of flexible cloud contact center solutions.
How to provide a digital customer experience to meeting customers on their own terms
The digital customer experience is often the main way a customer interacts with your brand. Here's why digital CX should be the focus of your CX strategy.
Verizon Customer Experience Annual Insights
Explore findings from our 4th CX Annual Insights Report, featuring global research on essential innovations and strategies to elevate CX and foster loyalty.
The ultimate guide to mobile edge computing
MEC can help companies enable near real-time operations. Learn what MEC is, how it works, and some of the private and public network MEC use cases.
How smart military bases are transforming national security
Discover how smart military bases leverage IoT, 5G, and automation to enhance security, improve readiness, and support military personnel and their families.
How to automate your IT management
Learn why enterprises are automating IT management, the strategic advantages it offers and how to successfully carry out IT automation.
What does Verizon 5G mean for public safety?
Discover Verizon 5G connectivity solutions tailored for first responders and public safety. Explore reliable network enhancements, low latency 5G Ultra Wideband, and mobile solutions with Verizon Frontline.
A closer look at Verizon 5G technology
Learn how Verizon's innovative 5G technology delivers advanced network capabilities that enhance public safety communications.
The truth about Public Sector AI misconceptions
Learn how AI can help support and empower Public Sector employees, and explore the common misconceptions affecting AI within the Public Sector.
2024 Payment Security Report: Key insights
Explore key insights from the Verizon 2024 Payment Security Report. Learn how you can measure, report on and implement a strong PCI security program.
Beat holiday hackers: 6 Cybersecurity tips
While the holidays are your busiest season, beware of humbug hackers eager to take advantage while you’re distracted. Review the top cybersecurity threats and our 6 cybersecurity tips to get ready for the holidays.
How to help prevent camera hacking: Best practices for remote workers
Camera hacking is a growing threat to firms and remote workers as work becomes more reliant on videoconferencing. Here's how to keep your business safe.
Industry insights
Learn how businesses and organizations are using technology to power their operations and overcome their challenges.
How to help prevent camera hacking: Best practices for remote workers
Learn to secure your webcam and prevent camera hacking with strong passwords, antivirus software, and secure Wi-Fi for remote work.
What is a smart base?
A smart military base is one where technology works seamlessly to enhance every aspect of military operations and readiness, and the quality of life for military families and civilian partners. Learn how Verizon can support a transformation to a smart-base today.
The history of phishing
The evolution of phishing has seen attackers graduate from swiping AOL user passwords to targeting entire governments. Learn why education remains the best defense.
A guide to upgrading or replacing your plain old telephone service line with wireless technology
Learn why wireless POTS replacement is important for keeping your mission-critical communications running, and how to secure a smooth transition.
What is zero trust and why does it matter
Learn about the fundamentals of zero trust, including how it works, why it's important and how to build a zero trust infrastructure.
Is 5G fixed wireless internet the future of business agility?
Learn why 5G fixed wireless internet can be crucial to modern business agility.
Case studies
See how businesses and organizations like yours are using tech to solve problems.
The Florida Panthers improve the fan experience with Verizon 5G Edge Cashierless Checkout
5G Edge Cashierless Checkout has become a game-changer in the retail world, especially in the sports and live entertainment space where a quicker trip to a concession stand can be the difference in seeing or missing the best part of a game, concert or show.
ADOT and MAG partner with Verizon for a successful pilot of 5G MEC virtual roadside units
When you're driving on a highway, your goal is to get to your destination as swiftly and safely as possible. Although you may not see them in action, regional agencies like the Arizona Department of Transportation (ADOT) are working hard behind the scenes to make sure your trip goes smoothly.
Floorcloud lays the groundwork for construction industry innovation with Verizon's Asset Tracking Solutions
Floorcloud is an innovative internet of things (IoT) quality management solution, custom-built for the building construction industry, and poised to make these common installation problems a thing of the past. To make their vision a reality, however, they needed the right IoT infrastructure.

content.title: Business Mobile Phones and Devices | Verizon
content.content:
Mobile
Power your on-the-go work with mobile phones, devices and plans for your business. On the network America relies on.
Business phones and devices
Smartphones
Choose from a range of cutting-edge smartphones from top brands, and give your business a boost.
Tablets
Help your teams stay productive where work takes them with lightweight, portable tablets and 2-in-1s.
Rugged devices
Find durable, rugged and ultra-rugged phones and tablets built for outdoor and harsh environments.
Mobile plans
My Biz Plan
Take control of your mobile plan. Choose exactly what you want and pay only for what you need. As low as $25/line per month.
Benefits
Switch and get a 5G phone on us.
Taxes & fees apply. New line or device upgrade w/device payment purchase agmt & My Biz Plan w/$20 monthly add-on spending or Business Unlimited Pro plan req’d. iPhone 16, Pixel 9 & Galaxy S25 offers are also available with the My Biz Plan w/$15 monthly add-on spending or Biz Unlimited Plus plan. Up to $999.99 (iPhone 16 Pro 128GB, Google Pixel 9 Pro 128GB or Samsung Galaxy S25+ 256GB), $929.99 (iPhone 16 Plus 128GB), $829.99 (iPhone 16 128GB) or $799.99 (Pixel 9 128GB or Galaxy S25 128GB) credit, varying by smartphone trade-in, applied to acct over the term of your agmt (up to 36 mos, 0% APR); promo credit ends when eligibility requirements are no longer met. Select biz customers w/6 or more mos of VZ service: credits begin in 1-2 bills. Other biz customers: credits begin 2-3 bills after trade-in is received by VZ. Smartphone trade-in must be received by VZ w/in 90 days & meet program requirements. Credit(s) will be charged back to acct if trade-in is not received within 90 days, differs from appraisal and/or does not meet program requirements. Most trade-in device conditions accepted; exclusions apply. 10-line trade-in limit per order. Cannot be combined with other device offers. Monthly smartphone fee after full trade-in credit: $0. Limited time offer.

Credit(s) will be charged back to acct if trade-in is not received within 90 days, differs from appraisal and/or does not meet program requirements. Most trade-in device conditions accepted; exclusions apply. 10-line trade-in limit per order. Cannot be combined with other device offers. Monthly smartphone fee after full trade-in credit: $0. Limited time offer.
Online Exclusive: New VZ customers can get $100 off a new smartphone.
New smartphone purchase w/new line, device payment agmt & My Biz Plan or Business Unlimited Start, Unlimited Plus or Unlimited Pro plan req’d. Available to new VZ business customers on initial purchase only. Acct. creation & initial purchase must be completed in one transaction. 0% APR. $100 credit applied to acct after 2-3 bills. Can be combined with select offers. VZ reserves the right to charge back to your acct all or a portion of the value of any promotional credit you received as part of this offer in the event you no longer meet the eligibility requirements. Any such charge back may be subject to the terms of your VZ agmt. Limited time offer.

VZ reserves the right to charge back to your acct all or a portion of the value of any promotional credit you received as part of this offer in the event you no longer meet the eligibility requirements. Any such charge back may be subject to the terms of your VZ agmt. Limited time offer.

Cust must transfer smartphone & number to VZ; new line activation & number transfer must be completed in one transaction. Smartphone must be compatible w/VZ network. $720 (My Biz Plan w/$20 monthly add-on spending, Biz Unlimited Pro 5G or Unlimited Pro 1.0) or $600 (My Biz Plan w/$15 monthly add-on spending, Business Unlimited Plus 5G or Unlimited Plus 1.0, ) credit applied to acct. over 24 mos; promo credit ends when eligibility requirements are no longer met. Credits begin in 1-2 bills & will include appropriate credit amounts from order date. Cust must retain smartphone & remain on selected plan with required monthly add-on spending in order to receive credit(s). Cannot be combined with other offers. Business Unlimited, My Biz Plan & add-on terms apply. Limited time offer.

Cust must transfer smartphone & number to VZ; new line activation & number transfer must be completed in one transaction. Smartphone must be compatible w/VZ network. $720 (My Biz Plan w/$20 mo add-on), $600 (My Biz Plan w/$15 mo add-on) or $480 (My Biz Plan w/$5 mo add-on) credit applied to acct. over 24 mos; promo credit ends when eligibility requirements are no longer met. Credits begin in 1-2 bills & will include appropriate credit amounts from order date.
